lead_paragraph: COOPERSTOWN, N.Y., July 29 (AP) — Thirty-three years after his career appeared to be over before it had barely begun, Bruce Sutter will receive the ultimate tribute: induction into the Baseball Hall of Fame.
snippet: COOPERSTOWN, N.Y., July 29 (AP) — Thirty-three years after his career appeared to be over before it had barely begun, Bruce Sutter will receive the ultimate tribute: induction into the Baseball Hall of Fame.
